actions.text: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Fazio to the remainder of the resolution.
On agreeing to the Fazio amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.

description: Amendment nominated Democratic candidates for Officers of the House.
purpose: An amendment to provide for the offering of the following as an alternative list of nominees to fill posts of Officers of the House: Tom O'Donnell as Clerk; George Kundanis as Sergeant at Arms; and Marti Thomas as Chief Administrative Officer.
